The anti-inflammatory, antinociception, antiseizure, and antibacterial effects of the MMEO have been shown in several pharmacological studies.
6, 7 The current study suggests daily doses of less than 100 mg/kg for the long-term administration of the MMEO in different oral dosage forms. Hence, it is necessary to establish the scientific basis for the therapeutic actions of this folk medicine since it may serve as the source for the development of more effective drugs.
